Name: BORIS RUSSIAN BEAR
About the game: You play as a Russian soldier who is trying to defend the border of his homeland from foreign invaders. Reinforcements will not come, there is only you and your loyal friend-an AK 47 with a 30-round magazine and a wooden butt. He will never let you down. Show heroism, destroy as many enemies as possible and protect Russia! Main Features Try on the role of a fighting Russian bear Destroy your enemies with an epic soundtrack Drink Russian ice vodka Play the Russian balalaika Feel the native Russian atmosphere
